title: テンプレートフォルダーについて
content: テンプレートフォルダーが2つあります。 1つ削除したいのですが削除ができません。 右クリックをしても削除項目がありません。 消えないフォルダの削除を方法を教えていただきたいです。
creator: s.nakato

title: thunderbird won't accept my passwords for outgoing server and it times out,  on one computer and does on another.
content: I have tried for weeks to fix this. On my webmail both email addresses work well with passwords. And I have two windows computers and one the thunderbird works well no problem in getting and sending emails. On the other I receive the emails okay and it's set up just as the other in incoming and outgoing settings and passwords but doesn't send emails as the server times out it says in error message.
creator: golfwidow1

title: Email quit working
content: Have not received any new emails past 2 weeks on laptop. I can’t even log in. Not problem receiving on desktop computer. Our internet server said no problem on their end. I followed solutions in Download manual. Got to last step on each one but always said configuration problem with user name or password. Of course won’t go any further. I’m lost!!!
creator: jolson13

title: MESSAGGI DI POSTA ARCHIVIATI SU SERVER LOCALE NON VISUALIZZATI DOPO AGGIORNAMENTO
content: Non riesco a leggere I MESSAGGI DI POSTA thunderbird ARCHIVIATE SU SERVER LOCALE DOPO GLI ULTIMI AGGIORNAMENTO

title: książkęaadresowa Google
content: Jak zintegrowaś książkę adresową Google z Thunderbird 142?bold text
creator: hotwind

title: Thunderbird can't connect to Gmail anymore
content:
When I try to fetch mail on Thunderbird for my gmail account it seems to load forever (no explicit error is shown, which is annoying in itself).

On a different computer I tried adding the same gmail account to Thunderbird; authentication through Google worked, but then Thunderbird got stuck loading on the last step.

On mobile, if I swipe down to update my mail it also starts loading forever.

Conversely, if I log into gmail by browser it all works correctly.
creator: itashadd

title: sending emails
content: Email messages will not send.
creator: mvanish

title: Duplicated "Sent" folders
content: My T'bird email account now shows two "Sent" folders. One with 972 messages and one with 995. Assuming the larger one is correct, how do I remove the other one? (both take up c260mbytes).
creator: simoncharlestomsett

title: Default view of thunderbird calendar begins at midnight
content:
Hello,

Since the update of Thunderbird 140.2.0esr (64 bits), when I look at the Thunderbird calendar after checking my emails, the default view goes back to midnight (as display on the attached picture) and I have to scroll every time to 8 am. The question was asked 5 years ago in the forum but the solutions to uninstall and reinstall the software did not fix the issue.

Do you know how the default view could begin at 8 am? Thank you I am using Ubuntu 24.04.3 LTS
creator: thibault.cremel

title: Thunderbird hibaüzenet
content:
Alábbi hibaüzentet dobja fel mindennap az elmúlt 1-2 hétben Thunderbird, hosszabb használat után: "Hiba - Beérkezett üzenetek a xxxx@xx.hu helyen. A "Beérkezett üzenetek a xxxx@xx.hu helyen." mappa tömörítése nem hajtható végre, mert a mappa nem írható. Ellenőrizze, hogy elegendő szabad lemezterület áll-e rendelkezésre, valamint azt, hogy rendelkezik-e írási jogosultsággal a fájlrendszerhez, majd próbálja újra."

Kérdésem, hogy mit tudok tenni ez ügyben? Szabad terület a gépen van, az nem lehet hiba. Mi frissült, vagy állítódhatott el, amikor pár éves használat után most írta ezt ki? Program beállítás kell?

Előre is köszönöm!
creator: takacslaci88

title: opening EML file stored on NAS problem
content:
When I try to open EML file stored on NAS that was previously stored using the same Thunderbird app (version 142.0 (64 bits)) the preview is blank (photos attached) although the message source shows content. When I copy this EML file from NAS to desktop and then open, the preview shows up correctly.

How to make it possible to open the EML straight from NAS and show its contents in the preview window.

Some time ago, with the previous (unknown) version of Thunderbird it was possible to open the EML straight from NAS and show its prebiew correctly.
creator: piotr.rendaszka

title: Re : mail a/c added with password, active receiving, but fails to send.
content:
Hello, 

         A sending fails on one Outlook mail a/c - Thunderbird reinstall to give a fresh start with v. 142.0

- fresh add of Outlook mail a/c with password, that is active receiving. However, yet fails to send, with a note re-enter password. However, no password entry panel is presented, only retry or cancel.

To check, Outlook mail login passes with recorded password and is simultaneously open on browser tab and mails sends from browser.

To check, a googlemail added sends and different Outlook mail a/c sends, both as added with the Hub. Both Outlook mail a/c's have matching settings, each has a different password.

So how to re-enter a password for Outlook mail that fails to send ? All commentary welcome. Colin DB
creator: c.brooking

title: Problème avec un mail, serveur sortant
content:
Bonjour, Nous sommes chez vous via le serveur Ionos. Nous avons un gros problème avec une de nos adresses mail : julien@fabriqueparis.fr

Le problème ne vient apparement pas de Ionos, donc je pense qu'il vient de l'application Thunderbird. Je n'arrive pas à installer cette messagerie sur mon Mac, dernière génration. Je ne sais plus quoi faire. Pouvez vous m'aider svp ?
creator: julien22

title: I don't know my password
content: My computer broke and I bought a new one. I want to continue using Thunderbird, but I don't know the password. I've been using it for a long time, but I either never set a password or I've forgotten it. So how can I find out?
creator: yasuhiro344

title: Notifications
content: When Thunderbird downloads a series of emails at once, i.e. when I load it up, I am getting a notification for each email individually, which is really annoying when I'm trying to do something else and it blocks me. How can I disable this?
creator: anniedunn

title: Task reminders not appearing in the reminder pop-up window with the calendar events
content:
Post "event reminder not working " reads as Solved. That post has a lot of discussion about the task reminder pop-up not working. I've tried all of the relevant remedies with no success, so I posting this more specific topic.

My tasks are not appearing in the reminder popup window with the calendar events. None of my previously created tasks are popping up. They do appear in the Task window, but not in the pop-up window. Sometimes, if I create a NEW reminder for the same day when Thunderbird is on or for a future day for a time when Thunderbird is on, the task pops up, other times it does not. If I change the date and time of a previously created Task to the current date and a future time when Thunderbird is on, it still doesn't appear in the pop-up window and sometimes it disappears from the Task area of the main Thunderbird window, but still appears if I open the main Task window/tab. If I get a NEWLY created Task to appear and I snooze it for a time when Thunderbird is on, sometime it pops-up again and other times it does not.

I do not use Google calendar or any other calendar, just Thunderbird (Lightning).

Thunderbird 142.0 (64-bit)

Edition: Windows 11 Pro Version: 24H2 OS build: 26100.4946 Experience: Windows Feature Experience Pack 1000.26100.197.0
creator: calvinou812

title: new computer
content: I have bought a new computer and like to install Thunderbird on my new computer. Now is it asking for my password but i cannot remember that anymore. What do I have to do without losing my existing account information like the send , deleted ,stored, inbox etc.
creator: johannes.vandemeer

title: Emails not being received
content: I have just switched to Thunderbird, being disgusted with Microsoft's new mail, but I am not receiving some, not all, emails. Also, incoming mail is very slow to show up.

Muchas Gracias Saludos

title: Can't connect to Comcast/Xfinity SMTP server
content:
I can't send mail via smtp.comcast.net. I can connect to IMAP and get mail, and I can send from my iphone and (new) Outlook. Running TB v142.0 (64 bit) on Windows 11. Issue is reproducible on second system. When I try to send mail, client tries for 1 minute, then times out with "Sending of the message failed. The message could not be sent because the connection to Outgoing server (SMTP) smtp.comcast.net timed out. Try again."

TB log says: 14:17:11.775 1756750631775 addons.xpi WARN Checking C:\Program Files\Mozilla Thunderbird\distribution\extensions for addons 14:19:37.714 mailnews.smtp: New client instance SmtpClient.sys.mjs:121:17 14:19:37.716 mailnews.smtp: Connecting to smtp://smtp.comcast.net:587 SmtpClient.sys.mjs:141:19 14:19:37.799 mailnews.smtp: Connected SmtpClient.sys.mjs:429:17 14:20:39.211 mailnews.smtp: NetworkError: a Network error occurred SmtpClient.sys.mjs:476:17

14:20:39.212 mailnews.smtp: Socket closed. title: Thunderbird - layout
content:
How do I restore the lay-out of the email program so I can have horizontal lay-out and see the content of the messages below the email? Now, in order to see the content of the email - Thunderbird opens a new tab.

I'm not a big fan of all the vertical options that are available.

Regards, Stewart
creator: stewart.leforte

title: Thunderbird can't save view as unthreaded - VERY ANNOYING
content: I have been using Thunderbird for over 10 years and I am a big Mozilla fan but I am driven mad by having to change sorting as Unthreaded every time I change folders in Thunderbird. Every time I change folder and come back to my inbox my messages are threaded. I then have to go to "Message List Display Options" (Beside the Quick Filter tab above the message window), and then Sort By and then Unthreaded. I am doing this all day long because there is no way to save the display setting. I have gone through the forums and did the Apply Current View to Folder and it's children suggested but this doesn't work. Doe's anybody have a solution for this or is the only solution to change to a different e-mail app?
creator: michael444

title: How to Change The Font Size On The Inbox Screen
content:
The type font on the inbox screen in v140 is so small it is unusable. How do I change it? What else do you need to know?

JC
creator: JerryC1958

title: Gmail OAuth login ends with blank page after "Allow" (Thunderbird 142, 115.13, 140.2 ESR – Windows 10 Pro)
content:
I use Thunderbird to manage my personal Gmail. After changing my Google account password, I had to go through the authentication process. At first, it failed with the message: “Cookies are not enabled. Try again.” On my main PC (Windows 10 Pro), I tried several times to set up my Gmail account in Thunderbird (profile changes, uninstall/reinstall), but without success. After those attempts, Thunderbird stopped showing the “cookies” message, and every setup attempt now ends in a blank (white) page: either just before the second-factor authentication (2FA), or — less often — right after the 2FA is completed. This behavior continues even now that cookies are properly enabled. The first Thunderbird version I used was 142.0, but I also tried 115.13 and 140.2 ESR with the same result. In all cases, the process always ends with the blank page, and the account setup never completes.

Thank you in advance for your help.
creator: anastasio31

title: Sending emails via Thunderbird
content:
Since 08/31, I can receive emails but when I send emails, they show up in Sent folder but recipients do not receive the email. I am using Internic. email: [edited] @hycotec.on.ca Outgoing server: smtp.internic.ca Port: 587 Security: STARTTLS Normal Password

I have temporarily shut off my firewalls but problem remains.

This is a business email and I need to get it back on-line ASAP. For phone assistance, I can reached at: [edited phone# from community support forum]
creator: jharris8

title: Double spacing
content:
Hi,

Pressing "enter" seems to double space next line my text automatically on platforms, and pressing "alt+enter" does single spacing next line. Is there anyway to change it to single spacing? Some older help threads mention going to settings or tools to find the "composition" option but that doesn't seem to exist anymore?

Thanks
creator: takoyaki820

title: lokale mappen/adresboek verdwenen na herinstallatie windows
content: Na een chat van een dag lang wegens updateproblemen met windows, heeft de Microsoft helpdesk mijn Windows remote opnieuw geïnstalleerd. alle geïnstalleerde programma's zijn verdwenen, inclusief mijn Thunderbird en alle lokale mappen/adresboeken/settings. Ik heb hier geen back-up van valt dit nog terug te traceren?
creator: jaymzie

title: Performance issue 30% to 100%
content:
I am running TB. Using the Windows Performance Monitor, the usage jumps from 30% to 90% and then 100% once TB is open. I am running 1.128.14.0esr (64-bit). I have the before and after screenshots of the CPU, see attached. Is this known behaviour?

I tried the steps at https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/profiling-thunderbird-performance to record. The Multiprocess Browser Toolbox window hung the 2nd time (the first time, nothing happened after Capture recording), then I left it 20 minutes and came back to the message that we were unable to connect to the browser within 30 seconds. It eventually finished, painful - htpps://share.firefox.dev/41tZ5xy
creator: boardtc

title: Run all email filters button
content: I have an archive of emails going back to the 1990's which Thunderbird manages nicely, but I have one niggle with IMAP which could be addressed if I could 'Run All' email filters. Explanation, in the past I used POP3 to move emails to the local storage and left copies on the host server which I could see even after moving the local copies to local storage. With POP3 there was no problem leaving the filters to just do their thing, but it was perhaps not the right approach. Currently I am using IMAP and the mobile devices can see all the recent emails as long as I switch off the filter to local folders. What is nice on the desktop is that the local folders pop up in the Unread folders section, but if I am out on the road I don't see them simply because only the ones left on the IMAP inbox are still visible. One option would be if I could switch off the filtering before going out and then do the local archiving when back at the desktop, but the easy option would be a 'Run All' button next to the 'Run Now' one rather than having to select each in turn ...
creator: lscesuk

title: Deleting gmail Accounts
content:
For reasons I can't fathom, Thunderbird and Google aren't speaking to each other at the moment. :)

have nuisance screens from Google that I cannot provide information in to resolve the problem. I believe that somehow Google is no longer recognizing passwords sent from Thunderbird and vice versa. I'm not receiving email in my Thunderbird inboxes.

My solution is to delete the affected accounts from Thunderbird and add them back. I have passwords.

Before I do this, I thought it prudent to ask the experts if this sounds like a good plan.

What say ye?
creator: rabbithutch1
